2.name: Side A : When placing cards, you may place the final card face down underneath your visible Animal card. During final scoring, it counts as an animal type of your choice.

3.name: Side B : When placing cards, you may place the final card underneath your personal pile.

2.name: Side A : Increase or decrease your draw value by 1.

3.name: Side B : Increase or decrease your placement value by 1.

2.name: Side A : Move the token corresponding to the main animal 1 extra card in the direction of your choice.

3.name: Side B : Move the token corresponding to the companion animal 1 extra card in the direction of your choice.

2.name: Side A : Immediately refill the River after each card you take.

3.name: Side B : When drawing cards, you may take 1 or more face-down cards from the top of the common draw pile.

2.name: Side A : Before placing your cards, swap a card from your Hand with a card from the River.

3.name: Side B : Before placing your cards, take your visible Animal card back into your hand. Careful, because you now have a new placement value this turn. If you don't have a visible Animal card, your placement value is considered to be 1

2.name: Side A : When drawing cards, you may choose cards from your Penalty zone as well as from the River.

3.name: Side B : Choose a card from your Penalty zone and place it in another player's Penalty zone.

1.name: Off
1.description: Forbids players to undo their turn before the drawing phase

2.name: On
2.description: Allows players to undo their turn before the drawing phase : all the cards placed are took back in hand and the moved tokens are moved back to their previous position
